text: Izumi is a Japanese restaurant located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It is a sister concern of Holey Artisan Bakery. ==History== Masayuki Nakajimaya is the executive chief of Izumi. The restaurant flies in Tuna from Tsukiji Market in Tokyo, Japan. In 2015, it was placed as the third best Japanese restaurant in Dhaka by The Daily Star foodies choice award. ==References== Category:Dhaka Category:Restaurants in Dhaka
title: Izumi (restaurant)
